title: Orientation & Setup
summary: Setting up your digital office and understanding the Moonshine product suite.
content: Welcome to Moonshine Capital. Today is about infrastructure. You cannot build a skyscraper on a swamp. We will set up your dedicated email, CRM access, and review the compliance handbook.

title: Product Knowledge: Term Loans
summary: Deep dive into our bread-and-butter product.
content: Term loans are the foundation of business funding. Learn the qualifications, interest rate structures, and ideal borrower profile.

title: Lead Generation 101
content: We don't wait for business; we hunt it. Today you will build your 'Top 100' list using the LinkedIn scraper method.

title: The Art of the Close
content: Objection handling is where the money is made. We will cover the 4 most common objections: Rate, Term, Fees, and Timing.

title: Referral Partnerships
content: Stop hunting one deal at a time. Partner with a CPA and get 10 deals a month.
